forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 39F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low around 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 3C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. A snow shower or two in the afternoon - otherwise, mostly cloudy. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low near 0C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 32F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. High near 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low near 30F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
